data.title: HOTEL TERME DI CASTELDORIA
data.meta_description:

data.text:
Structure

At the foot of the Torre dei Doria, nestled in the green of unspoiled nature, the Casteldoria Baths are born in an extremely lucky territory because it is characterized by an encounter of exceptional natural elements: thermal springs, river, mountain, lake and sea. With the Phoenicians, the Greeks and the Romans, and always appreciated by the peoples of neighboring towns, today the Casteldoria Baths, open all year round, offer high quality treatments and treatments thanks to the Castello di Salento Spa, which flows to the source at a temperature of 76 ° C, ideal for sludges, baths, showers, thermal inhalations, irrigation, hydropinotherapy, steam baths, hydromassage and thermal sauna. The Spa of Casteldoria Spa is organized in two different structures, located on the opposite shores of the Coghinas River: The Casteldoria Baths in the Commune of Santa Maria Coghinas and the Thermal Swimming Pools in Casteldoria, in the Municipality of Viddalba.

Rooms

Comfortable and comfortable rooms all have: air conditioning, telephone, television, private facilities, wi-fi internet connection, minibar, hairdryer, safe

Services

Reception, Elevator, Restaurant, Bicycle Storage, TV Room, Bar, Garden, Terrace, Conference Room, Parking, Disabled Facilities and Wheel Chair Access, Play Area, Indoor Pool with Sunbeds, Bicycle Rental, Spa

Health centre

The Spa Wellness Center in Casteldoria is the ideal place to listen and find yourself, counting on regenerating treatments that can restore pleasure and beauty, but also on advanced and customized medical advice to improve the quality of your life. For you a wide choice among relaxing and healing massages, facial and body treatments with mud and salmonromiodic water in the Casteldoria Baths.

Thermal pools

"Piscinte Termali Hotel": the route IDROTERMALE, an area designed for guests of the hotel, located on the third floor of the building, in the penthouse area with stunning views over the Coghinas River. A large 12-meter tank with two cervical jets sprayed with thermal water at a temperature of 39 ° C, a small 2/4-seater tank with dorsal and sacral massage jets sprayed also with thermal water at a temperature of 37 ° C and a plantar path for a wellness walk with alternating hot and cold water that is very useful for lymphatic and blood circulation

"Piscinte Thermali Vibbalda": SEMIOLIMPIONIC THERMAL SWIMMING POOL AND GREAT VIDDALBA THERMAL SPA

On the right bank of the Coghinas River, above a hill with breathtaking views of the sea, you can find the Thermal Swimming Pools in Casteldoria: fitness center, spa rehabilitation with half-olimpic pool, sprayed at alternating hours with new salamberger thermal water at 27 ° C You can practice free swimming or follow swimming courses, swimming, water gym, hydrobrook, watsu and many other activities; large bathtub with twelve hydromassage jets sprayed at alternate hours with new salobromiodic thermal water at a temperature of 37 ° C for thermal treatments, physiotherapy, postural gymnastics and at the same time inhalation of salobromoiodic vapors. The bromine present in the chemical composition of the water also has a disinfectant function, so choosing to go swimming in our pools means finally abandoning the idea of ​​swimming with that annoying and pungent odor of chlorine and all the problems that this substance entails such as: redness, irritation to the eyes and skin, dehydration of the skin, hair and scalp. Body diving, partial or total, is an excellent treatment from a therapeutic, athletic and aesthetic point of view. The thermal water is renowned for its antiseptic, anti-inflammatory, detergent, decongestant, immune-stimulating and muscle relaxant properties and are indicated for skin care. In fact, to the touch and sight the effects are immediate: the skin is immediately brighter, soft and silky. The salami waters of the Casteldoria Baths come from the subsoil at a temperature of about 76 ° C, they are cooled to different temperatures and conveyed into the large spa with 12 hydromassage jets and waterfall mushroom. At a temperature between 35 ° -37 ° C, and, in the large semiolimpion pool at a temperature of 27-30 ° c.

To use the thermal pools, it is mandatory to have: - headphones, swimsuit, non-slip slippers (clean), shoe covers, towels or bathrobes, key padlocks.

Animal Friends

Allowed for free small size upon notice at the time of booking

Conditions

Check in: from 4 pm onwards

Check out: by 11.30am

Santa Maria Coghinas and surroundings
